item.title: Major updates to NetEscapades.​AspNetCore.​SecurityHeaders
item.description: In this post I describe the recent major changes to NetEscapades.AspNetCore.SecurityHeaders, a NuGet package for adding security headers to your apps. Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/major-updates-to-netescapades-aspnetcore-security-headers/
